prompts.name: Financial Forecast Model
prompts.description: This template is built for generating a compelling financial forecast model. Substitute {{assumptions}} with the premises on which your forecasts are based, {{projected financials}} with estimates of income, expenses, and cash flow, and {{risk assessment}} with evaluation of potential financial risks.
prompts.content: Formulate a financial forecast model based on realistic {{assumptions}} and detailing {{projected financials}} for the next fiscal year. Incorporate a robust {{risk assessment}} to identify potential threats or opportunities. Please avoid explicit predictions or guarantees about future performance, as this could be legally contentious.

prompts.name: Investment Evaluation Process
prompts.description: This template aids in structuring an investment evaluation process. Replace {{investment criteria}} with your guidelines for considering investments, {{analysis methods}} with techniques used to assess investment viability, and {{investment return projections}} with expectations of returns.
prompts.content: Develop an investment evaluation procedure illustrating the {{investment criteria}}, the use of appropriate {{analysis methods}}, and sketch an initial {{investment return projections}}. Be cautious not to leak sensitive commercial information or misleading predictions.

prompts.name: Annual Budget Plan
prompts.description: This template is designed for devising an annual budget plan. Replace {{revenue sources}} with the company's funding streams, {{expense categories}} with broad sections of outgoing costs, and {{financial goals}} with your fiscal targets for the upcoming year.
prompts.content: Draft an annual budget plan comprising key {{revenue sources}}, itemised {{expense categories}}, and defined {{financial goals}}. Exclude individual salary details and any form of confidential financial information related to private contracts or deals.

prompts.name: Fund Allocation Strategy
prompts.description: Use this template to create a detailed fund allocation strategy. Replace {{financial objectives}} with explicit fiscal goals, {{allocation metrics}} with rules used for distributing funds, and {{performance indicators}} with measures for assessing the strategy's efficiency.
prompts.content: Outline a robust fund allocation strategy articulating specific {{financial objectives}}, established {{allocation metrics}}, and objective {{performance indicators}}. Abstain from specifying any confidential details regarding share allocations or personal investment percentages.

prompts.name: Cost Reduction Plan
prompts.description: This template assists in constructing a cost reduction plan. Substitute {{cost reduction areas}} with areas identified for cost savings, {{cost-cutting measures}} with the methods to reduce expenses, and {{impact assessment}} with the analysis of the plan's effects on the operations and quality.
prompts.content: Formulate a cost reduction plan pinpointing the {{cost reduction areas}}, illustrating the {{cost-cutting measures}}, and culminating in the {{impact assessment}} of the proposed changes. Refrain from using controversial savings methods or plans that could adversely impact employee morale.

prompts.name: Financial Risk Management Framework
prompts.description: This template aids in establishing a financial risk management framework. Substitute {{risk categories}} with types of risks your business faces, {{mitigation strategies}} with plans to tackle these risks, and {{review process}} with regular audits to assess the current risks.
prompts.content: Develop a financial risk management framework outlining identified {{risk categories}}, implementing comprehensive {{mitigation strategies}}, and followed by a scheduled {{review process}}. Steer clear of any proprietary risk-related data or information that could be classified as sensitive or confidential.

prompts.name: Capital Expenditure Plan
prompts.description: This blueprint is for designing a capital expenditure (CapEx) plan. Replace {{CapEx items}} with intended capital expenses, {{budget estimates}} with approximations of costs, and {{ROI projections}} with the return on investment estimates for the capital outlay.
prompts.content: Create a detailed capital expenditure plan highlighting key {{CapEx items}}, with assigned {{budget estimates}} and the predicted {{ROI projections}}. Be mindful to exclude sensitive company-specific data, such as upcoming merger or acquisition plans.

prompts.name: Financial Audit Procedure
prompts.description: This template will guide you in framing a financial audit process. Substitute {{audit areas}} with the sectors your audit will focus on, {{audit methodology}} with the audit approach, and {{timeline and responsibilities}} with your planning on task allocation and deadlines.
prompts.content: Design a streamlined financial audit procedure that encompasses {{audit areas}}, provides a defined {{audit methodology}}, and sets out a clear {{timeline and responsibilities}}. Do not disclose specifics about past frauds or financial discrepancies unless absolutely necessary.

prompts.name: Tax Compliance Policy
prompts.description: Use this template to construct an effective tax compliance policy. Replace {{tax obligations}} with your company's specific tax duties, {{procedures and controls}} with steps taken to ensure compliance, and {{penalty management}} with how your company handles potential infractions.
prompts.content: Draft a tax compliance policy detailing specific {{tax obligations}}, summarising default {{procedures and controls}}, and outlining the approach to {{penalty management}}. Avoid delving into detailed tax avoidance schemes or historical tax disputes.

prompts.name: Budget Variance Report
prompts.description: This template is for outlining a budget variance report. Substitute {{financial period}} with the timeframe under review, {{variance categories}} with areas where actual results differed from the budget, and {{corrective actions}} with steps to realign the budget and actual spending.
prompts.content: Script a budget variance report consolidating key disparities between budgets and actuals for the {{financial period}}. Classify distinct {{variance categories}} and propose suitable {{corrective actions}}. Shy away from highlighting variations which are confidential or potentially damaging to the company's reputation.
